statements: SELECT * FROM device_locations;
SELECT device_id, location_id FROM device_locations;
SELECT * FROM device_locations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM device_locations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, location_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE longitude > 0;
SELECT device_id, location_id, timestamp FROM device_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM device_locations WHERE location_id = 12345 ORDER BY device_id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) AND location_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC
SELECT device_id, location_id, timestamp FROM device_locations WHERE latitude < 30 OR longitude > -90 ORDER BY location_id DESC, timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM device_history WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT history_id, previous_location, current_location FROM device_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM device_data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_data WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY device_name ASC;

SELECT device_name, timestamp FROM device_data JOIN device_history ON device_data.device_id = device_history.device_id WHERE device_history.current_location = 'Room B' AND device_data.location != 'Room C';
SELECT device_name, previous_location, current_location FROM device_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Count, location FROM device_data GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY Total_Count DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location_id FROM IoTDevices WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE last_update > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_known_location FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Sensor%';
SELECT movement_id, device_id, from_location_id, to_location_id, movement_timestamp FROM DeviceMovements ORDER BY movement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_name, last_known_location FROM IoTDevices WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location_name FROM IoTDevices JOIN DeviceLocations ON IoTDevices.location_id = DeviceLocations.location_id;
SELECT d.device_name, dl.location_name, dm.movement_timestamp FROM IoTDevices d JOIN DeviceLocations dl ON d.location_id = dl.location_id JOIN DeviceMovements dm ON d.device_id = dm.device_id;

SELECT device_name, location_name, movement_timestamp FROM IoTDevices JOIN DeviceLocations ON IoTDevices.location_id = DeviceLocations.location_id JOIN DeviceMovements ON IoTDevices.device_id = DeviceMovements.device_id WHERE device_name LIKE 'Temperature%';
SELECT * FROM device
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device
SELECT order_id, status FROM logistics
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location
SELECT movement_id, timestamp, movement_type FROM movement
SELECT * FROM device WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device WHERE device_id = 101;
SELECT device_name, status FROM device WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple' AND status = 'active' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM location WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < 40;
SELECT movement_id, timestamp, movement_type FROM movement WHERE device_id = 201 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices
SELECT device_name, status FROM devices
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY recorded_at DESC
SELECT * FROM movements WHERE movement_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT warehouse_name FROM warehouses WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT * FROM locations
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices
SELECT movement_id, device_id, from_location_id, to_location_id FROM movements WHERE device_id = 1
SELECT warehouse_name, location_id FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 3
SELECT shipment_id, from_warehouse_id, to_warehouse_id, status FROM shipments
